workflow.title: Three Microbase responders used for the Identification of Microorganisms present in IonTorrent Data using SFF_Exctract MIRA or Ray and BLAST
workflow.description: Three microbase responders are used to take .sff data from IonTorrent and report on the organisms present within the data. It also takes three JSON input messages. The first calls sff_extract python script, the next calls MIRA or Ray and the final responder calls BLAST. For more information including a user manual visit www.bioinformatix.co.uk
